newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia's Monomeros Q1 net up 173.9 pct.
newsitem.headline: Colombia's Monomeros Q1 net up 173.9 pct.

text.p: Colombia's largest chemical company, Monomeros Colombo-Venezolanos, reported the following first quarter results, the securities superintendency said Tuesday:
Operating income 62.2 billion pesos vs 54.8 billion
